comments.body: I think this might work better if this is `static reject<R>(reason?: R): Promise<any, R>` â€“ is there a reason I'm missing not to do that? (There very well might be; that's a genuine question.)
For any future readers: the reason is to match the underlying RSVP types, [here](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/rsvp/index.d.ts#L172).
